div.span: Welcome to eaves Santa Margarita, where sensible apartment living in Orange County meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Rancho Santa Margarita apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-home washer and dryers. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, package service, and more. Located on Via Serena, our Orange County apartments are conveniently located within easy access of the 241 Corridor. Residents will also have access to an amazing array of shopping, dining and recreation venues that includes Ancient Peaks Winery, Wood Ranch BBQ & Grill, Pozo Saloon, Tutto Fresco, Tijeras Creek Golf Club and The Range. Rejuvenate in one of our three relaxing outdoor spas. Feel the burn in our fitness center and afterward take a dip in our sparkling swimming pool. Simply put, our apartments in Rancho Santa Margarita offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for?

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions.

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.
div.div: 111 Via Serena • Rancho Santa Marg, CA 92688 • (949) 763-4739 • (949) 518-0172

We offer quality Rancho Santa Margarita apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-home washer and dryers. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, brings high-speed internet, powered by Cox Communications, pre-installed in all apartments upon move-in and billed with your monthly rent. Simply put, our apartments in Rancho Santa Margarita offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Rancho Santa Margarita Apartments by eaves Now that you’ve arrived in Rancho Santa Margarita, we want to make sure you have an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves Santa Margarita, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Via Serena, our Orange County apartments are conveniently located within easy access of the 241 Corridor. Residents will also have access to an amazing array of shopping, dining and recreation venues that includes Ancient Peaks Winery, Wood Ranch BBQ & Grill, Pozo Saloon, Tutto Fresco, Tijeras Creek Golf Club and The Range. Rancho Santa Margarita Apartment Community If you choose to be a part of eaves Santa Margarita, then you’ll also have easy access to a range of perks, all at no extra cost to you. Rejuvenate in one of our three relaxing outdoor spas. Feel the burn in our fitness center and afterward take a dip in our sparkling swimming pool. Our professional staff will quickly and efficiently deal with any maintenance issues that crop up, so you’re free to focus on more important things in your life.
